Package com.prckt.krowemarf.components.Posts

Interface _Posts<T extends _DefaultMessage>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - All Messages that extends the interface _DefaultMessage
    All Superinterfaces:
    _Component, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Posts

    public interface _Posts<T extends _DefaultMessage>
extends _Component
    The post component is used to create deferred messages. Connected to the database to add, or suppress messages.

      • loadPost

                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.sql.SQLException,
                                                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method call the database and mounts in memory all messages to give at the client All message are identified by a id. The id is very util for de remove method
